column4: I upgraded from Gutsy to Hardy. My software sources, third party has several entries for Gutsy. It's safe to remove them from the list?
Zal: errors while loading the video driver are in /var/log/Xorg.0.log and would be the place to start looking.
I've done that my error is: (EE) Failed to initialize GLX extension (Compatible NVIDIA X driver not found)
any ideas what that could be?
